Resource Name Conflicts
Resource names must be globally unique. Try adding a random suffix or timestamp.
Quota Exceeded

Insufficient Permissions

The selected region may not have capacity for the requested VM size. Try a different region or VM size.
Network Configuration
Check that VNET address spaces don't overlap with existing networks.
